amendment.description: An amendment numbered 11 printed in the Congressional Record to add a section which states that if the bill authorizes the appropriation of funds to implement this Act and does not reduce an existing authorization of appropriations to offset that amount, then the provisions of this Act shall cease to be effective.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Waxman amendment (A006) Failed by recorded vote: 164 - 254 (Roll no. 772).
